About Me

Let's talk

BIO

Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in financial technology, specializing in Murex development, integration, and front-office support.
Currently part of the Murex team at JP Morgan Chase & Co., delivering high-quality solutions across the project lifecycle for Change the Bank initiatives. Extensive expertise in Murex 3.1.x, with proven skills in Shell scripting, Oracle, and Java, and hands-on experience in upgrading, migrating, and supporting Murex systems. Known for consistently meeting critical project milestones, streamlining workflows, and driving technical excellence across global banking projects.
Additionally, two years of experience as a Kondor developer, supporting financial data management for major clients.

Core Skills

  • Contributed to Change the Bank projects at JP Morgan, delivering high-quality code throughout the entire project development lifecycle.
  • Worked on migration and green field implementation of Murex from MX2 to latest MX 3.1.5
  • Worked on L2 and L3 requests from banks and implemented the change successfully.
  • Worked on Pre trades, pricing templates, Look up tables in Murex.
  • Worked with the OSP FO Validations and BO Validations.
  • Worked with TDS [Trade data synchronisation] tool developed by Murex to import positions in batch mode at EOD.
  • Worked with modern technology stack MEAN to create a customer bot for Murex.

Financial Skills

  • Murex Mxml and FO Developer
  • Murex Pre trade Rules
  • Murex BO Module: Confirmations
  • Murex Deliverable Module: Payments
